comment.author: 48764293@N08
comment._content: I *think* this may be my grandma.  She worked for Douglas when she was in her early 20s.  I have seen pictures of her at about this age that were black and white and they are VERY similar.

comment.author: 77975599@N03
comment._content: Your looking at the quintessential “Rosie The Riveter”.  God bless the American female, they put them in the air during the war.
